Articles.Content: Does Anyone Know How To Install Mods On The 64 Bit Launcher?

Does Anyone Know How To Install Mods On The 64 Bit Launcher?

ARe you using Steam or just the KSP windows? If you have ever installed mods before the process hasn't changed (As far as I can tell)

Mods are installed the same way as 32-bit, and any mods that are already installed should work for both versions, and saves will be accessible. The real problem right now is that 64-bit has a lot of bugs that are only present in 64-bit, so you need to be careful.
